onboardingPage.pageOneDescription: My Laundry helps you stay in control of your finances. Track your income, set limits, and understand where your money goes — all in one beautiful, easy-to-use app.
onboardingPage.pageTwoDescription: Tired of logging every expense? My Laundry scans your SMS and notifications securely to detect and predict transactions automatically — so you don't miss a single one.
onboardingPage.pageThreeDescription: Choose what works best for you — envelope-based budgeting for strict control, or category-based tracking for a flexible overview. My Laundry adapts to your style.
onboardingPage.pageFourDescription: Securely sign in with your Google account to begin managing your money better with My Laundry.
